Pre-Game Insights: Team India are expected to use the final T20I as an opportunity to fine-tune their strategies and test their bench strength.
The Afghan team, known for their spirited performances, will be looking to regroup and deliver a strong performance in the last T20I.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 3rd T20I will be held at M.Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru on January 17, 2024, 1:30 pm GMT | 07:00 pm IST.
